scripts.heroku-postbuild: mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -fsSL https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/pgdg.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/pgdg.gpg] http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt jammy-pgdg main' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list && apt-get update -y
